body_content.explanation: abbreviation for too long; didn't read: used to comment on something that someone has written, for example on social media:
examples: If a commenter responds to a post with "tl;dr", it expresses an expectation to be entertained without needing to pay attention or to think.
I havenâ€™t been able to keep up with this thread (TLDR).

body_content.explanation: a short summary (= a short, clear description giving the main facts or ideas) of piece of writing or a subject of discussion:
examples: Can we have a TL;DR for those of us with short attention spans?
Each discussion paper should start with a TLDR summarising the main points.
